name: The Security Report
description: Scrivener points to chaotic projection: schematics, energy fluctuations, breach data.
promptTask: **Synthesize & Structure**: As Overseer (Role), generate security report (Task) identifying top 3 vulnerable sectors (Context: energy & history), as numbered list (Format), excluding 'offline' (Constraint). Demonstrate structured intent.

feedback.missingPersona: Framework Fail: Missing Role. Define 'As Dungeon Overseer...'.
feedback.missingFormat: Framework Fail: Missing Format. Specify 'as numbered list'.
feedback.missingExclusion: Framework Fail: Missing Constraint. Add 'exclude offline'.
feedback.missingCriteria: Framework Fail: Missing Context/Criteria. Specify 'based on energy and history', 'top 3'.
